result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Hilario T Montiel

records.addlTxt: Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

Defendant Hilario T Montiel in court.  Attorney Joshua Ryan-Polczinski in court for Hilario T Montiel.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew Herrmann in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Charges and penalties explained by the court. Not guilty plea entered by counsel and trial reserved. Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court. Requesting 30 days. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendants Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Hilario T Montiel in court.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. SPD needs to reappoint. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Prosecuting attorney James T. Sempf in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Hilario T Montiel in court. Defendant was advised of his right to an attorney, attorney options form give, referred to SPD.  Defendant was given a copy of the criminal complaint, charges and penalties explained.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
State's Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.
